title: Lynda - Creating Ebooks for the Kindle with Tony Harmer
description:
Lynda - Creating Ebooks for the Kindle with Tony Harmer
2h 13m Beginner Jun 23, 2014/ uploaded in Sept 13, 2014 by 2boweb


Need to convert an ebook into a Kindle-ready format? No matter what your file's originÃ¢â‚¬â€InDesign, Word, Pages, or even a plain text editorÃ¢â‚¬â€Tony Harmer will show you how to crack it open and convert it to a Kindle-compatible format with your choice of free tools: Sigil, calibre, and KindleGen. Learn about the range of ebook formats and editing tools, get a short primer on HTML and CSS, and see how to build out ebook features like tables of contents, links, and metadata. When you're done creating your ebook, Tony will show how to upload it to Amazon's Kindle Store.
Topics include:

    Reviewing ebook formats
    Converting to EPUB from Word and Pages
    Converting HTML/XHTML to EPUB
    Adding a cover image
    Editing metadata
    Building a TOC
    Adding and editing links
    Publishing to Amazon
